channel.title: How to get my server files ready for people to download! Help me?
channel.description: OK umm i need help on making my server files ready to put up for download i have teamviewr but i would like to know how please And also how do i keed it from lagging so damn much! please help!

item.title: How to get my server files ready for people to download! Help me?
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

You would take the server folder ( with the files in it) and turn it into a archive file by clicking the file with a a right mouse click.
After that upload it to megaupload and rapidshare and whatever and give the link. Remember to upload the archive of the server folder not the server files

Ty - Zero

Read full topic
